About Me

How I got here..

BIO

Watching my dad build computers as a kid instilled in me a love of tech and problem solving. Dad wanted me to pursue Computer Engineering, so of course I got an Fine Arts degree.
At the time, I didn't realize both were creative endeavors.

As a software developer, I utilize my degree in visual design to build applications that delight the eyes and foster user engagement.
